1.title: No Escape
1.plot: Five mother-daughter teams enter a program with Life Coach Laura, in an attempt to fix their problems. Through tailored exercises and intense personal coaching, they must put everything on the line in order to save their relationships.

2.title: Knot Without My Daughter
2.plot: The Ibrahim Family faces a large hurdle when daughter Luna and her mother Amal are unable to see eye-to-eye. While struggling to maintain her perfect veneer, Mom Ashley backs herself into conflict with two daughters.

4.title: Anger Mismanagement
4.plot: A group session takes an unexpected turn when Laura challenges Shun and Amber to change their attitudes. Mom Ashley learns the real impact of her negative words on daughter Brittany.

5.title: Words and Letters
5.plot: In a private session with Laura, Ashley is forced to face her biggest fear when she must write a possible eulogy in the event of Velvet's death. Shun takes Laura aside to express concerns about the program.

6.title: Gone Girls
6.plot: Luna and Ruba demand Amal take responsibility for her part in their fractured relationship. Tonja and Kami face a big decision after a request from Laura.

8.title: Tears Fears and Farewells
8.plot: The mothers and daughters are put to one final test in an exercise that forces them to confront their greatest fears. The women come together for an emotional farewell dinner.

imdb.plot outline: "Fix My Mom" explores these complex dynamics, following five vibrant mother-daughter pairs who are pushed beyond their comfort zones in a final effort to salvage the relationships they hold most dear. Each episode, the mothers and daughters are put to the test through specifically designed challenges aimed at getting to the root of their issues. With the guidance of life coach Laura Baron, the ladies embark on a rollercoaster journey together in hopes of mending their broken bonds before the damage becomes irreparable.
imdb.title: Fix My Mom
plot: "_Fix My Mom_ (qv)" explores these complex dynamics, following five vibrant mother-daughter pairs who are pushed beyond their comfort zones in a final effort to salvage the relationships they hold most dear. Each episode, the mothers and daughters are put to the test through specifically designed challenges aimed at getting to the root of their issues. With the guidance of life coach Laura Baron, the ladies embark on a rollercoaster journey together in hopes of mending their broken bonds before the damage becomes irreparable.
